channel.title: Hosting a webclient
channel.description: Ok, i followed the tutorial that was made to make your cache auto download, and jarsigning, but now im stuck at the last part, how can i put my client on forums? It shows up with a white box, red X in the left hand top corner... why doesnt it load?

item.title: Hosting a webclient
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

You have to make your cache a .zip useing WinRar, then upload it to DropBox.com.

After this you will need a Website creator that has “File Manager”. Upload your Client.jar to the file manager on that certain page, then insert the HTML code for the Webclient of the page.

Read full topic
